rules.hover: Treat others with respect, regardless of your liking towards them. Racism, harassment, sexim etc is NOT tolerated.

rules.rule: Extreme, persistent, uncomfortable or vulgar language/content is not allowed
rules.hover: Swearing and vulgarity IS ALLOWED. If it is extremely common, or your using language that is making other people uncomfortable, you will be asked to stop
Spamming of any kind (short frequent messages or extremely long copy-pastas) is not allowed.
